i do not like coming here but at the same time it 's comforting .
i bring the flag so that i can feel him .

sad | to be here . i 'll come again next year .
output.sentences: Thousands of head stones decorated the many acres belonging to the cemetery.
A woman who never thought she would enter a cemetery now stood before her deceased husband's grave.
In her hands she held his folded flag, the only condolence she was given by his superiors.
Her new puppy jumped over her legs, issuing a rare smile from her.
Near the end of the cemetery, she turned to say a final goodbye.
